    • Method Detail

      • reconstructBackupFilePath

        public static final CcddClassesComponent.FileEnvVar reconstructBackupFilePath(CcddClassesComponent.FileEnvVar[] selectedPaths,
                                                                              java.lang.String chosenBackupFileName)
        Take the full path to the backup file and remove the file name portion. Take the user selected file name and append this a the initial path. Note: This is to handle cases where there are spaces entered into the filename
        Parameters:
        selectedPaths - Array containing file paths
        chosenBackupFileName - User selected backup file name
        Returns:
        A reconstructed path with the expected backup filename at the expected location or null on error

      • removeExtensionTimeStamp

        public static java.lang.String removeExtensionTimeStamp(java.lang.String extension,
                                                        java.lang.String dateTimeFormat,
                                                        java.lang.String chosenBackupFileName,
                                                        boolean isTimeDateStamped)
        Take in a string of type [ID]_[DATE-TIME-STAMP].[EXT] -Note:[DATE-TIME-STAMP] is optional Strip _[DATE-TIME-STAMP].[EXT] and return the [ID] Note: If an error in the chosenBackupFileName is detected, a failsafe result will be returned. If a null string is entered, an exception will be thrown
        Parameters:
        extension - Extension type (typically .dbu)
        dateTimeFormat - Format of the datetime (HHMMSS etc..)
        chosenBackupFileName - User selected backup file name
        isTimeDateStamped - Is there an _[DATE-TIME-STAMP] field in the chosenBackupFileName
        Returns:
        [ID]
